gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਬਨਤ ਬਚਿਤ੍ਰ ਅਭਰਨ ਸਿੰਗਾਰ ਸਜਿ ਭੇਟਤ ਭਤਾਰ ਚਿਤ ਬਿਮਲ ਅਨੰਦ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Banat Bachitr Abharan Singaar Saji , Bhaytat Bhataar Chit Bimal Anand Hai ?
translation: Just as a wife embellished with many form of ornaments feel happy meeting her husband with all the love in her heart,

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਸਰੁਵਰ ਪਰਿਫੁਲਤ ਕਮਲ ਦਲ ਮਧੁਕਰ ਮੁਦਤ ਮਗਨ ਮਕਰੰਦ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Saruvar Paridhulat Kamal Dala , Madhoukar Mudat Magan Makarand Hai ?
translation: Just as a bumble bee feels satiated drinking the elixir from the lotus flower.

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਚਿਤ ਚਾਹਤ ਚਕੋਰ ਦੇਖ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਧਰੈ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਕਿਰਨ ਅਚਵਤ ਹਿਤ ਚੰਦ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Chit Chaahat Chakor Daykh Dhiaan Dharai , Anmrit Kiran Achavat Hit Chand Hai ?
translation: Just as Ruddy sheldrake looks at the moon with rapt attention and drinks its ambrosial rays with his heart and mind;

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਗਾਯਬੋ ਸੁਨਾਯਬੋ ਸੁਸਬਦ ਸੰਗਤ ਮੈਂ ਮਾਨੋ ਦਾਨ ਕੁਰਖੇਤ੍ਰ ਪਾਪ ਮੂਲ ਕੰਦ ਹੈ ॥੫੬੦॥
transliteration: Taisay Gaayabo Sounaayabo Sousabad Sangat Main , Maano Daan Kurakhaytr Paap Mool Kand Hai ?560?
translation: Similarly, reciting and singing the supreme hymns/words of the True Guru in a congregation assembled in the presence of the True Guru is capable of destroying sins from the roots-just as it is believed that charity made in Kurukshetra destroys all the sin
